text: It's been babies galore for Cristiano & Georgina, as the couple welcomed their twins via surrogate in June of last year, and only four months later, she gave birth to their daughter Alana Martina. So these two clearly have their plates full with not one, not two, but three little new ones to take on! Cristiano is also the father of his seven year old son, Cristiano Ronaldo Jr., from a previous relationship. The couple took the twins to the pool, where Mateo and Eva looked SOOO adorable while floating around, but one of them definitely wasn't having a good time!
